Name: Divino's
Ingredients: 30 ml De Kuyper Brown Crème de Cacao
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini glass .
Prepare garnish of dust with grated white chocolate.
Review: The chocolate liqueur takes the acidity off the wine without masking its flavour.
History: Discovered in 2005 at DiVino, Hong Kong.
Nutrition: One serving of Divino's contains 185 calories
